sentences.sContent: At that time, I thought homosexuality is what hooligans do .
sentences.sContent_eng: At that time, I thought homosexuality is what hooligans do .
sentences.sCn: 那时候，我认为同性恋都是些流氓痞子。

sentences.sContent: "In anthropology, you can't equate third gender with homosexuality, " he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "In anthropology, you can't equate third gender with homosexuality, " he said.
sentences.sCn: “在人类学中，你不能将同性恋和第三性别混同，”他说。

sentences.sContent: Of course homosexuality is bad for society. If everyone were homosexual, there would be no society.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course homosexuality is bad for society. If everyone were homosexual, there would be no society.
sentences.sCn: 同性恋当然是危害社会的。要是每个人都是同性恋，那就没有社会了。

words.tran: 关心同性恋者权利的；同性恋的（等于homosexual）
对同性恋的恐惧；对同性恋的憎恶
同性恋者；同性恋权力支持者

trans.tranCn: 同性恋； 同性恋行为
